cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

configSale(uint256,uint128,uint64,uint64.details: Can only be called by the owner. Creates a NEW sale with version increment.

params.checkInventory: If true, verifies contract holds at least maxSupply tokens.
params.maxPerAddress: The maximum per address (0 for unlimited).
params.maxSupply: The maximum supply available for sale.
params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH).

constructor.details: Initializes the contract with the deployer as the owner.

emsWithdrawBatch(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Can only be called by the owner. Prevents withdrawing inventory needed for active sales.

params.amounts: Array of amounts corresponding to each token ID.
params.tokenIds: Array of token IDs to withdraw.

getActiveSalesBatch(uint256,uint256).details: Useful for off-chain querying to avoid gas limits on large arrays.

params.count: The number of items to return.
params.startIndex: The starting index in the active array.

returns.configs: Array of SaleConfig structs for the batch.
returns.tokenIds: Array of token IDs in the batch.

getLiveSales().details: Filters active sales that are live based on current timestamp.

returns.configs: Array of SaleConfig structs for live sales.

returns._0: The remaining supply available for sale.

getSaleInfo(uint256).details: Returns unpacked values for gas efficiency.

returns.isLive: Whether the sale is currently live.

getUserPurchaseInfo(uint256,address).details: Computes remaining allocation and purchase eligibility using versioned tracking.

returns.canPurchase: Whether the user can make a purchase now.
returns.purchased: The amount purchased by the user in the current sale version.
returns.remainingAllocation: The remaining amount the user can purchase.

returns._0: True if the sale is active.

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Required for IERC1155Receiver interface; returns the magic selector to confirm support.

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Required for IERC1155Receiver interface. Only accepts tokens from ksItems contract.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

purchase(uint256,uint32).details: Validates the purchase, handles payment, updates state, and transfers tokens. Reentrancy protected.

params.quantity: The number of tokens to purchase.
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to purchase.

purchaseBatch(uint256[],uint32[]).details: Validates each purchase, handles payments, updates state, and batch transfers tokens. Reentrancy protected.

params.quantities: Array of quantities corresponding to each token ID.
params.tokenIds: Array of token IDs to purchase.

purchaseBatchOptimized(uint256[],uint32[.details: Validates purchases, aggregates payments (one transfer per unique ERC20), updates state, and batch transfers tokens. Reentrancy protected.

params.quantities: Array of quantities corresponding to each token ID.
params.tokenIds: Array of token IDs to purchase.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

setFundsRecipient(address).details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits FundsRecipientChanged event.

params._fundsRecipient: The new address to receive funds.

setKSItems(address).details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits KSItemsUpdated event.

params._ksItems: The new address of the ERC1155 contract.

setPaused(bool).details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits SalesPaused event.

params._paused: True to pause, false to unpause.

setSaleStatus(uint256,bool).details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits SaleStatusUpdated event.

params.active: True to activate, false to deactivate.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Required for IERC1155Receiver and general interface detection.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

updateSaleParams(uint256,uint128,uint64).details: Can only be called by the owner. Does NOT reset totalSold or user purchases.

params.newEndTime: The new end timestamp (must be >= current endTime).
params.newPrice: The new price per token (use current price if no change desired).

wdERC20(address).details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits ERC20Withdrawn event.

wdETH().details: Can only be called by the owner. Emits ETHWithdrawn event.

activeSaleTokenIds(uint256).notice: Array of token IDs for currently active sales.

configSale(uint256,uint128,uint64,uint64.notice: Configures or updates a sale for a specific token ID.

emsWithdrawBatch(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Batch withdrawal of tokens to the owner.

fundsRecipient().notice: The address where funds from sales are sent.

getActiveSaleTokenIds().notice: Returns all token IDs for currently active sales.

getActiveSales().notice: Returns the count of active sales.

getActiveSalesBatch(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a paginated batch of active sales.

getLiveSales().notice: Returns all currently live sales (active and within time range).

getRemainingSupply(uint256).notice: Returns the remaining supply for a token ID.

getSaleInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves sale information for a specific token ID.

getUserPurchaseInfo(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves purchase information for a user and token ID.

isSaleActive(uint256).notice: Checks if a sale is active for a token ID.

ksItems().notice: The ERC1155 contract address for the items being vended.

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: Handles receipt of multiple ERC1155 tokens.

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Handles receipt of a single ERC1155 token.

purchase(uint256,uint32).notice: Purchases a specified quantity of a single token.

purchaseBatch(uint256[],uint32[]).notice: Purchases multiple tokens in a batch.

purchaseBatchOptimized(uint256[],uint32[.notice: Optimized batch purchase that aggregates ERC20 payments by token for efficiency. [experimental]

saleConfigs(uint256).notice: Mapping of token IDs to their sale configurations.

setFundsRecipient(address).notice: Sets the recipient address for funds from sales.

setKSItems(address).notice: Sets the address of the ERC1155 contract for items.

setSaleStatus(uint256,bool).notice: Activates or deactivates a sale for a token ID.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if the contract supports a given interface.

updateSaleParams(uint256,uint128,uint64).notice: Updates specific parameters of an existing sale without resetting purchase tracking.

versionedUserPurchases(bytes32).notice: Mapping of versioned purchase keys to amounts

wdERC20(address).notice: Maintenance withdrawal of all balance of a specific ERC20 token to the owner.

wdETH().notice: Maintenance withdrawal of all ETH balance to the owner.
